Title: Majesti (China) Skeletonized Movement in Exhibition-Style Hunter Case Pocket Wat
Description: Majesti (China) Skeletonized Movement in Exhibition-Style Hunter Case Pocket Watch With Chain China; Majesti; Man’s; Contemporary CASE: The yellow-gold plated exhibition-style case features floral and swirl decorations. DIAL: This white enamel dial displays Roman numerals and Breguet hands. MOVT: This 15-jewel stem-set movement with lever escapement is gilt with a skeletonized layout.
